title: The Science of Mysticism with Zevi Slavin Round 2- Voices with Vervaeke
description:
This is part two of a series of deep dia logos sessions about mysticism and cognitive science with Zevi Slavin from the amazing Youtube channel Seekers of Unity: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL9A83sJIYNAovCA92uaTRQ

Round 1 of this four part series can be found on Zevi's channel here:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vN0TYleG14&t=412s

Round 3 will be found on Zevi's channel and round 4 back here.

This is part of my series Voices with Vervaeke: Science, Spirituality, and the Meaning Crisis. You can support my work on Patreon, with the proceeds going into the research I do at the University of Toronto on the Meaning Crisis and the cultivation of wisdom here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Join the Discord Server to discuss and reflect upon my work: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
